arts.ttl: Eddie Howe sends strong Alexander Isak transfer message after Newcastle goal
arts.sum: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe has sent another strong transfer message to Alexander Isak's potential suitors after the striker was on the scoresheet once again in the Premier League meeting with Aston Villa. Speaking after the game, Howe was full of praise for the striker, who is regularly linked with Newcastle's Premier League rivals.

arts.ttl: Alan Shearer makes controversial Jhon Duran red card point after Newcastle vs Aston Villa chaos
arts.sum: Alan Shearer has admitted he thought the decision to show Jhon Duran a red card during Newcastle's 3-0 win against Aston Villa was "harsh". Once the referee has given the red there was no way they were going to overturn it." Newcastle will not be too bothered about controversies though as they moved up to fifth in the Premier League table, above Villa and Manchester City.

arts.ttl: What Newcastle fans were heard singing at Aston Villa supporters towards the end of today's 3-0 win
arts.sum: Newcastle United made it four wins in a row in all competitions with their 3-0 Premier League win over Aston Villa on Boxing Day. The...

arts.ttl: Inside 20-man tunnel bust-up during Newcastle's fiery win over angry Aston Villa
arts.sum: NEWCASTLE 3-0 ASTON VILLA: Jason Tindall and Victor Manas, Villa’s lead analyst, were sent off for their tunnel confrontation at the break amid reports of a 20-man bust-up, which Eddie Howe said was "not far off"

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim faces nightmare after second Man United suspension blow for Newcastle clash
arts.sum: The latest Manchester United news as Ruben Amorim is set to be without two big players for the home game against Newcastle united.

arts.ttl: Newcastle legend Alan Shearer reacts to Jhon Duran's Aston Villa red card
arts.sum: It took Aston Villa less than an hour to confirm their intention to appeal Jhon Duran’s red card after the Colombian striker was sent off during today’s 3-0 loss at Newcastle United. Join our Aston Villa WhatsApp group and get the latest breaking news, interviews and opinion sent straight to your phone, plus matchday team news and live updates of all the action.

arts.ttl: Every word Unai Emery said about Jhon Duran red card, VAR frustration and Newcastle defeat
arts.sum: The red card is the same like I was thinking two weeks ago or at the start with VAR. I accept it if he uses VAR for the red card.

arts.ttl: Newcastle 3-0 Aston Villa: Player ratings as Magpies soar into fifth place
arts.sum: Alexander Isak belatedly doubled Newcastle's lead shortly before the hour mark, tapping in Jacob Murphy's square pass after a brilliant through ball from Bruno Guimaraes. Anthony Gordon let rip from the top left-hand corner of Villa's box and left Emi Martinez - declared by FIFA as the best goalkeeper in the world - clasping fistfuls of empty air as the ball sailed into the top corner.

arts.ttl: Newcastle dismantle Aston Villa as red card ‘killed game’
arts.sum: Aston Villa defender Ezri Konsa admitted that Jhon Duran’s red card was too big a hurdle to overcome as Newcastle United ran out 3-0 winners at St James’ Park on Boxing Day. Anthony Gordon opened the scoring just a minute after the game kicked off with a superb strike for his fourth Premier League goal […] The post Newcastle dismantle Aston Villa as red card ‘killed game’ first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa handed fresh Jhon Duran red card verdict with 'emotional control' message
arts.sum: Former Aston Villa midfielder Thomas Hitzlsperger believes Jhon Duran needs to learn to control his emotions after he was sent off in Thursday's 3-0 defeat at Newcastle United. And Hitzlsperger, who played for Villa between 2001 and 2005, believes Duran let his emotions get the better of him in the Boxing Day affair.
